name: MovieLabs
0:
”Alexa, ask movie labs to suggest me a good movie”
”Alexa, ask movie labs what's a great comedy movie to watch”
”Recommend a good netflix film”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie labs
des:
Movie recommendations for all moods! The easy to use skill offers a curated list of great movies/TV Series across all genres. The recommendations range from evergreen masterpieces of the yesteryear to the latest blockbusters. Go ahead and invoke the movie expert, and ask away! 

Key features: 
1. Well-researched list of movies in genres - comedy, action, romance, fantasy, drama, thriller, horror and many more. 
2. Direct commands for IMDb top rated and Oscar winning movies. 
3. 'Netflix and chill' is made easy with a quick recommendation straight from the lab.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
